dataset_id: LANDMET Ancillary Monthly Mean Effective and Spectral Albedo Data L3 V1 (LANDMET_ANC_TESA) at GES DISC
title: LANDMET Ancillary Monthly Mean Effective and Spectral Albedo Data L3 V1 (LANDMET_ANC_TESA) at GES DISC
summary: This is an ancillary product containing the total effective surface albedo at solar wavelengths originated from the ISCCP FD radiative fluxes product, and the spectral albedos from the MODIS black-sky products.  This is a monthly climatology data, with spatial grid cell on equal-area mapping at 1.0-degree-equivalent.
